houses.name: Humble Cottage
houses.description: A simple wooden cottage with a thatched roof. Basic amenities but cozy and warm.
houses.address: Willow Lane, 3rd House from the Bridge

houses.name: Merchant's House
houses.description: A well-built stone house with proper windows and a sturdy roof. Good for a growing family.
houses.address: Market Street, Corner of Gold Avenue

houses.name: Noble Manor
houses.description: An elegant stone manor with decorative carvings and a grand entrance. The finest in town.
houses.address: Noble Heights, 1st Estate on the Hill

houses.name: Wizard's Tower
houses.description: A tall stone tower with magical wards and enchanted lighting. Perfect for magical studies.
houses.address: Mystic Grove, Tower of the Arcane

houses.name: Dwarven Hall
houses.description: A sturdy underground dwelling with stone walls and metalwork. Built to last centuries.

houses.name: Elven Treehouse
houses.description: A beautiful home built into the branches of an ancient tree. Harmony with nature.
houses.address: Whispering Woods, 3rd Tree from the Clearing

houses.name: Peasant's Hut
houses.description: A simple mud and straw hut. Basic shelter but very affordable.
houses.address: Mud Lane, Last House on the Left

houses.name: Royal Palace
houses.description: A magnificent palace with gold trim and marble floors. The ultimate in luxury living.
houses.address: Royal District, Palace of the Crown

houses.name: Adventurer's Inn
houses.description: A converted inn with multiple rooms and a common area. Perfect for social types.

houses.name: Hermit's Cave
houses.description: A natural cave with basic modifications. Very cheap but quite primitive.
